titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4519) to provide for the disposition of certain lands in Arizona under the jurisdiction of the Department of the Interior by means of an exchange of lands, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-769.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 272 - 86 (Record Vote No: 236).

bill.summary: 7/12/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4519 (Arizona land transfer).
